ingredients.content: 1 fresh red chili, small, cut into pieces, deseeded if desired

preparations.content: Place chili and garlic into mixing bowl and chop <b>2 sec/speed 7<b>.
Add peanut oil and sauté <b>3 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>.
Add peanuts and coconut milk and cook <b>4 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>, then heat <b>10 min/175°F/speed <b>.
Add palm sugar, tamarind paste, fish sauce, shrimp paste and salt and cook <b>2 min/212°F/speed 1<b>.
Purée <b>1 min/speed 10<b>, transfer to a bowl and cool completely before serving.
